content.query:
-- v_bdc_attribute
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE v_bdc_attribute (
	[attribute_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[attribute_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_personal_data] nvarchar(4000),
	[minimise_after_processing] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_this_special_category_data] nvarchar(4000),
	[retention_period] nvarchar(4000),
	[attribute_information_owner] nvarchar(4000),
	[type] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[priority] nvarchar(4000),
	[resolution] nvarchar(4000),
	[work_log] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_entity_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_modified] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ims/v_bdc_attribute.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

-- v_bdc_entity
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE v_bdc_entity (
	[entity_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[entity_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[business_area] nvarchar(4000),
	[entity_information_owner] nvarchar(4000),
	[entity_information_expert] nvarchar(4000),
	[type] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[priority] nvarchar(4000),
	[resolution] nvarchar(4000),
	[work_log] nvarchar(4000),
	[business_criticality] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_modified] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ims/v_bdc_entity.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

-- v_data_flow
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE v_data_flow (
	[data_flow_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[data_flow_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_owner_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_expert_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_bdc_ent_source_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_bdc_ent_dest_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_int_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_info_asset_source_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_info_asset_dest_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_modified] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ims/v_data_flow.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

-- v_dpia
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE v_dpia (
	[dpia_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[dpia_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[pm_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[contract_owner] nvarchar(4000),
	[organisation_areas_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[link_draft_dpia_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_registered_] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_to_mhclg_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_to_welsh_gov_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_returned_by_mhclg_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_returned_to_iao_pm_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_dpia_completed_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_signed_off_at_risk_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_iao_accepted_risks_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[review_period] nvarchar(4000),
	[last_current_and_accurate_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[dpia_num_container_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_to_sdpm] nvarchar(4000),
	[residual_risks] nvarchar(4000),
	[disagreement] nvarchar(4000),
	[io_decision_outcome] nvarchar(4000),
	[io_screening_outcome] nvarchar(4000),
	[dpia_controlled_document_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_of_next_review_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_implementation_reqs_com_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_owner_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_expert_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[pers_resp_implementation] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_modified] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ims/v_dpia.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

-- v_dsa
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE v_dsa (
	[dsa_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[dsa_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[type] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[priority] nvarchar(4000),
	[data_being_shared_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[direction_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[why_shared_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[how_shared_securely_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[how_stored_securely_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[frequency_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[lawful_basis_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[personal_data_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[special_category_data_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[special_category_basis_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[retention_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[destruction_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[who_will_have_access_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[transfers_outside_of_uk_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[data_sharing_num_container_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[help] nvarchar(4000),
	[data_discloser_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[data_receiver_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[dsa_schedules] nvarchar(4000),
	[documents_ims_data_sharing_1_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[controllership_type_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_of_next_review_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_date_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_1_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_3_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_2_contact_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[personal_data_shared_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[special_category_data_shared_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[start_date_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_owner_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[information_expert_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[last_current_and_accurate_d_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_2_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_1_contact_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[party_3_contact_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[planning_legislation_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[third_party_recipients_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[review_period_c] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_modified] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ims/v_dsa.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO
